turn.0: ELI5: why can we move in any direction in space but only one direction in time?
turn.1: Physicist here, and this was fine.
turn.2: Would the third dimension be time in the perspective of the stick figure?
turn.3: Yes. Picture a book flipping its pages. The stick figure moves in 2d space as the pages flip (3rd dimension).
turn.4: Is time only at play when the pages are being flipped? what if it's just a stationary sheet of paper?
turn.5: Then it is a universe without time.
